scripts.install:all: npm --prefix frontend install --legacy-peer-deps && npm --prefix backend install --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.build:frontend: npm --prefix frontend install --legacy-peer-deps && npm --prefix frontend run build
scripts.start:backend: npm --prefix backend install --legacy-peer-deps && npm --prefix backend run start
scripts.start: npm run build:frontend && concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"
